title: China 's share of global gross domestic product ( GDP ) 2012 to 2024
summary: In general Share of global GDP has rose over the Year.
Share of global GDP is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2022.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2018 and 2019.
Maximum Share of global GDP, about 20.61 was reported at Year 2022
Minimum Share of global GDP about 18.16 was reached at Year 2017
